please_log_in: ଜାରି ରଖିବା ପାଇଁ ଲଗ୍ ଇନ୍ କରନ୍ତୁ
login_required: ${app} ବ୍ୟବହାର କରିବା ପାଇଁ ଆପଣ ଲଗ୍ ଇନ୍ କରିବା ଉଚିତ୍ I
currently_logged_in: ଆପଣ ବର୍ତ୍ତମାନ ଲଗ୍ ଇନ୍ କରିଅଛନ୍ତି I
to_continue_to_projects: ପ୍ରକଳ୍ପ ଜାରି ରଖିବା ପାଇଁ, "ପ୍ରକଳ୍ପ ଜାରି ରଖନ୍ତୁ" ଉପରେ ଟିପନ୍ତୁ I
dev_mode_enabled: ବିକାଶକାରୀଙ୍କ ପ୍ରଣାଳୀ ସକ୍ଷମ କରାଯାଇଛି I ବିକାଶକାରୀଙ୍କ ପ୍ରଣାଳୀରେ ${app} ପାଇଁ କୌଣସି ଟେକ୍‌ନିକାଲ ସାହାଯ୍ୟ ଯୋଗାଇ ଦିଆଯାଇନାହିଁ I
no_internet: ସର୍ଭର ସହିତ ସଂଯୋଗ କରିବାରେ ଅସମର୍ଥ I ଦୟାକରି ଆପଣଙ୍କ ଇଣ୍ଟରନେଟ୍ କନେକ୍‌ସନ୍ ଜାଞ୍ଚ୍ କରନ୍ତୁ I
using_internet: ଆପଣ ଇଣ୍ଟରନେଟ୍‌ରେ ତଥ୍ୟର ପ୍ରସାରଣ କରିବାକୁ ଯାଉଛନ୍ତି I କ'ଣ ଆପଣ ବାସ୍ତବରେ ଏହା କରିବାକୁ ଚାହୁଁଛନ୍ତି କି ?
do_not_show_again: ଏହି ଚେତାବନୀକୁ ପୁନର୍ବାର ଦେଖାନ୍ତୁ ନାହିଁ I
running_latest_version: "ଆପଣ ${app} ର ନୂତନ ସଂସ୍କରଣ ସଞ୍ଚାଳନ କରୁଛନ୍ତି I"
changing_locale_effects: "ଉପଭୋକ୍ତା ଇଣ୍ଟର୍‌ଫେସ୍‌ଙ୍କ ଭାଷାର ପରିବର୍ତ୍ତନ ମେନୁ, ବାର୍ତ୍ତାଳାପ, ଏବଂ ପ୍ରକଳ୍ପ ସେଟ୍ ଅପ୍‌ରେ ମିଳିଥିବା ଭାଷାକୁ ପ୍ରଭାବିତ କରିବ I"
changing_locale_note: "ଧ୍ୟାନ ଦିଅନ୍ତୁ: କୌଣସି ଏକ ସାଧନରେ ଯାଞ୍ଚ କିମ୍ବା ଅନୁବାଦର ଭାଷାକୁ ପରିବର୍ତ୍ତନ କରିବାରେ ସାହାଯ୍ୟ କରିବା ପାଇଁ, ସାଧନର ଚୟନ କରିବା ସମୟରେ ଦୟାକରି ଏକ ଭିନ୍ନ ମୁଖ୍ୟ ଆଞ୍ଚଳିକ ଭାଷାକୁ ଚୟନ କରନ୍ତୁ I"
feedback_error: "ଆପଣଙ୍କ ପ୍ରତିକ୍ରିୟାକୁ ଉପସ୍ଥାପନା କରିବାରେ ଅସମର୍ଥ I ପୁନର୍ବାର ଚେଷ୍ଟା କରନ୍ତୁ I"
alignment_prompt: “କ'ଣ ଆପଣ ନିଜ ପାଠ ସହିତ ସଂରେଖଣ ଡାଟାକୁ ଏକ୍ସ୍ପୋର୍ଟ୍ କରିବାକୁ ଚାହୁଁଛନ୍ତି ?”
based_on_earlier_work: "${wycliffe_associates}ଙ୍କ ଦ୍ବାରା କରାଯାଇଥିବା ଆଦ୍ୟ କାର୍ଯ୍ୟକୁ ଆଧାର କରି ଯାହା ଆଇ ଏସ୍ ସି ଅଧିନରେ ସଂସ୍କରଣ ହୋଇଅଛି।"
third_party_attributions: ତୃତୀୟ ଦଳ କୋଡ୍ଅତିରିକ୍ତ ସ୍ବତ୍ତ୍ବାଧିକାର ସୁଚନା ଏବଂ ଲାଇସେନ୍ସ୍ ସର୍ତ୍ତାବଳୀ

updates.failed_checking_for_source_content_updat: Unable to finish checking for source content updates.
updates.source_content_updates_unsuccessful_down: Failed to download source content updates.
updates.source_content_up_to_date: All source content is up to date.
updates.select_the_gateway_language_content_to_d: Select the Gateway Language content you would like to download and update.
updates.update_available:
There is a new version of ${app}.
You are running version ${old_version}. Version ${new_version} is now available.

users.to_log_out: "ଲଗ୍ ଆଉଟ୍ ହେବା ପାଇଁ, "ଲଗ୍ ଆଉଟ୍ କରନ୍ତୁ" ରେ ଟିପନ୍ତୁ।"
users.no_d43_account: "ଯଦି ଆପଣଙ୍କର ଏକ ${door43} ଆକାଉଣ୍ଟ ନାହିଁ, ତେବେ ଆପଣ ଏକ ଖୋଲିପାରିବେ ।"
users.may_create_d43_account: "ଯଦି ଆପଣ ଏକ ଆକାଉଣ୍ଟ ବର୍ତ୍ତମାନ ପାଇଁ ଖୋଲିବାକୁ ଚାହୁଁନାହାନ୍ତି, ତେବେ ଆପଣ ଏକ ଅତିଥି ଭାବରେ ଜାରି ରଖିପାରିବେ।"
users.d43_info_1:
${door43} is a free, online, revision-controlled content management system for open-licensed biblical material.
It provides free, remote storage and collaboration services for creators and translators of biblical content.
users.may_be_guest: "ଆପଣ ଜଣେ ଅତିଥି ପାଇଁ ମନୋନୟନ ହୋଇପାରନ୍ତି ଏବଂ ନିଜ ପରିଚୟକୁ ବେନାମ ରଖିପାରନ୍ତି I"
users.not_create_d43_account: ${app} does not currently support creating a ${door43} account.
users.may_create_d43: You may create an account online at
users.read_and_agree: I have read and agree to the terms and conditions.
users.known_as_username: You have chosen to be known as ${username}. This username will be publicly viewable.
users.known_not_comfortable: If you are not comfortable with being known as ${username}, you may Cancel and enter a new name.
users.how_to_proceed: How would you like to proceed?
users.login_error: An error occurred while attempting to log in.
users.session_invalid: Your login has become invalid. Please log out and log back in.
users.by_continuing: By continuing, you affirm that you have read and understand the terms and conditions and agree to:
users.not_infringe: Only add content that does not infringe on someone else's copyright.
users.not_conflict: Only add content that does not conflict with the Statement of Faith.
users.release_contributions: Release your contributions to the content under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

projects.error_setting_up_project: Oops! We have encountered a problem setting up your project to be loaded. Please contact Help Desk (${email}) for assistance.
projects.error_loading: Oops! We have encountered a problem loading your project. Please contact Help Desk (${email}) for assistance.
projects.select_project_from_list: Select a project from the list.
projects.to_export_project: To upload or export a project or edit the project details click
projects.supported_projects: USFM projects and ${tstudio} projects (saved in version 11 or greater) are supported.
projects.no_projects_found: No projects have been found. Follow instructions at left to import a project.
projects.books_available: In this version of ${app}, the translationWords tool supports projects from the New Testament and the Word Alignment tool supports projects from the whole Bible.
projects.supports_any_book: ${app} supports projects for any book of the Bible.
projects.tools_required_resources: However, the project will only open in translationWords or translationNotes if the necessary resources for the selected Gateway Language are on your system. Click "${actions} / ${check_for_content_updates}" to download the latest.
projects.no_search_results: No project matching your search criteria was found.
projects.cancel_import_alert: Canceling now will abort the import process and the project will need to be re-imported before it can be used.
projects.project_already_identified: This project has been identified as a ${originalBook} project. Are you sure you want to change it to a ${suggestedBook} project?
projects.must_be_logged_in_alert: You must be logged in with a ${door43} account to upload projects. Please log out and then back in with a ${door43} user account.
projects.upload_modified_error: ${project_name} cannot be uploaded because there have been changes to the translation of that project on your ${door43} account.
projects.merge_export_error: This project has merge conflicts and cannot be exported. Select the project to resolve the merge conflicts, then try again.
projects.project_already_exists: The project you selected (${project_name}) already exists.
projects.project_overwrite_no_alignment_message: Select "${over_write}" if you would like to overwrite the text of your existing project with this import. All check data will be retained, except where the text has been changed. In this case, the check will be invalidated and have to be redone.
projects.project_overwrite_has_alignment_message: The project being imported will overwrite your existing alignment data if there are conflicts.
projects.no_obs_error: ${app} does not support checking for ${obs}. It will not be loaded.
projects.no_tn_error: ${app} does not support checking for ${tn}. It will not be loaded.
projects.no_tw_error: ${app} does not support checking for ${tw}. It will not be loaded.
projects.no_tq_error: ${app} does not support checking for ${tq}. It will not be loaded.
projects.no_manifest_error: Unable to find the manifest for project ${project_name}. It will not be loaded.

projects.not_project_url_error: The URL ${project_url} does not reference a valid project.
projects.not_usfm_file_error: The project you selected (${project_path}) is an invalid USFM project.

projects.online_import_error:

projects.project_merge_error: There was an error merging this project with the existing ${project_name} project.
projects.import_again_as_new_project: Please import the project again as a new project.

${project}

tools.resource_missing_for_tool: The current tool requires a different version of the UGNT. Please click Download to retrieve this resource.
tools.no_checks_selected: You must select a category to launch this tool
tools.select_tool_from_list: Select a tool and a gateway language from the list.
tools.tw_part1_description: A tool to comprehensively check the meaning of key terms in the Bible using a set of clear, concise definitions and including suggestions for translation.
tools.alignment_description: A tool to align the translation with the original biblical languages in order to show how the translation communicates the meaning represented in the original. This data can be useful in creating other resources such as concordances and interlinear Bibles in the target language.
tools.please_select_gl: Please select the Gateway Language from which you would like to check your translation.
tools.missing_verse_warning: WARNING: This Bible version does not include text for this reference.
tools.no_selection_made: No selection has been made. Click the Select button, then select the translation for this check.
tools.selections_invalidated: Some selections are no longer valid and are removed.
tools.make_changes: First, make changes to verse above
tools.select_reason: Next, select reason(s) for the change
tools.alignments_reset:
There have been changes to the current verse which interfere with your alignments.
The alignments for the current verse have been reset.
tools.invalidation_checking: Checking if this edit conflicts with saved selections and alignments...
tools.alignments_reset_wa_tool:
Changes have been detected in your project which have invalidated some of your alignments.
These verses display an icon of a broken chain next to the reference in the side menu.
tools.invalid_verse_alignments_and_selections: Changes have been detected in your project which have invalidated some selections and some alignments. These verses display an icon of a broken chain next to the reference in the side menu.
tools.invalid_check_found: There is a problem with the content for this check: ${report} Do you want to report this problem so it can be fixed?
